physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 6 x 4 inches, Black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: ''Etta Miller Robinson.'' Printed on front of card: ''Nast, new gallery cor. 16th & Curtis Sts. Denver, Colo.''

mods.abstract: Formal portrait of Etta Miller Robinson who wears a flowered full-length dress with lace at the collar and cuffs, and a sash at the waist. "Etta Miller Robinson" is handwritten in pen on the back of the photograph. Robinson was married to Louis Robinson and was the mother of Samuel Robinson of Robinson Dairy.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 107.
Original photograph donated by Irene Miller Stein, sister of Etta Miller Robinson.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
